name: channel_videos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube.
Tool description: With the YouTube Data API, you can add various YouTube features to your app. Use the API for search, videos, playlists, channels and more.
API description: Fetches videos from a specified YouTube channel using RapidAPI.

hl.description: Language parameter for the results, default is 'en'.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination, default is None.

filter.description:
Filter key, default: `videos_latest`

Keys you can enter:

- `videos_latest`: Returns videos (by latest)
- `streams_latest`: Returns live streams (by latest)
- `shorts_latest`: Returns short videos (by latest)
- `live_now`: Returns current live streams
